alert.note: Alert for Susitna Valley (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued April 11 at 7:44AM AKDT until April 12 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 AM AKDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 8 inches, with localized amounts as high as 12 inches. Highest amounts north of Talkeetna. * WHERE...Susitna Valley. * WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 10 AM AKDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow will fall during the day today, bringing up to 3 inches of snow. Snow intensity will increase heading into the evening hours, with the heaviest snow late this evening through the overnight hours. Snow will gradually diminish from west to east Wednesday morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For the latest road conditions call 5 1 1 or visit 511.alaska.gov.
